Class LoginWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.GUIPackage.LoginWindow

  • public class LoginWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Alexey on 21.02.2017. the class of Login Window Storage list - list of users, that read from file "login.txt"
